text: Salvador Castañeda Salcedo (born 20 November 1957) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the State of Mexico. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Jalisco Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians
title: Salvador Castañeda Salcedo
